name: Christmas Lights
description: So simple. One of my favorite holiday tunes to enjoy with a nice evening cup of tea and a good book.

name: Love
description: This 'Kiss Me' band was blessed and cursed by that hit. It overshadowed some incredible tunes

name: Real Thing
description: If you want to broaden your sonic horizons, check this one out. It shouldn't work, but it does.

name: Acrobat
description: This lesser known hit from the Irishmen shows a depth that often is overlooked after so many hits.
